channel.title: CLDR on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in CLDR on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Delete a currency
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Currencies > Add 3 currencies : GBP, JPY and USD 3 new currencies are created Message “Successful creation” appears Click on the 3-dot button for USD > Delete A popup titled “Delete selection” appears Click Delete to confirm the deletion Message “Successful deletion.” appears USD is no longer in the list of currencies

item.title: Search a currency by ISO code
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Currencies > Add 3 new currencies : USD, PYG and JPY Message “Successful creation." USD, PYG and JPY are in the list of currencies Search by ISO “EUR” > Click Search Currency Euro is displayed Search by ISO : “US” Currency US Dollar is displayed Search by ISO : “PY” 2 currencies are displayed : Japanese Yen and Paraguayan Guarani Search by ISO : “P” 3 currencies are displayed : British Pound, Japanese Yen and Paraguayan Guarani Click Reset All currencies are displayed

item.title: Search a currency by enable/disable
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Currencies > Add a new currency : USD > Save USD currency is created Message “Successful creation.” Disable currency USD by switching the toggle button USD is disabled Message “The status has been successfully updated.” Search by Enabled : YES > Click Search Currency Euro should be the only currency available Search by Enabled : NO > Click Search Currency USD Should be the only currency available Add a new currency > Choose GBP > Save Message “Successful creation.

item.title: Reset currency default settings
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Currencies > Click on Edit Euro currency > Modify elements > Save Message “Successful update." Currency is edited. Currency name is updated with mention “(Edited)” Click Edit Euro currency > Click on rounded arrow Reset > Save Message “Your symbol and format customizations have been successfully reset for this language.

item.title: Edit symbol / format currency
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to International > Localization > Currencies > Edit the currency > Click Edit symbol / format Popup opens with 2 steps Add symbol of your choice + choose format > Apply Popup disappears and List of currencies will be updated Click the round arrow to Reset it Currency should be reset Message “Your symbol and format customizations have been successfully reset for this language.

item.title: Reset symbol / format settings
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to International > Localization > Currencies > Edit the currency > Click Edit symbol / format Popup opens with 2 steps

item.title: Enable/Disable a currency
Check in create order the currency available
